pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group.

pathParameters.name: hostGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the dedicated host group.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
